languages.text: "Сколь бы прочным ни был клинок, как бы верно ни служил госпо{mf|дину|же}, когда время его подходит — он отправляется в ножны".
"It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
languages.original_text: "Сколь бы прочным ни был клинок, как бы верно ни служил госпо{mf|дину|же}, когда время его подходит — он отправляется в ножны".

traits.locale_text: "No matter how strong the blade, no matter how faultless its service, when the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
"No matter how strong the blade, no matter how faultless its service, when the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
"It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
"It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
"It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
"It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

languages.text: «No importa lo fuerte que sea una hoja ni lo impecable de su servicio: cuando llega el momento, ha de regresar a la vaina».
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

traits.locale_text: «No importa lo fuerte que sea una hoja ni lo impecable de su servicio: cuando llega el momento, ha de regresar a la vaina».

languages.text: 「刃がどれほど強かろうと、どれほど完璧であろうとかまわない。時が来れば、鞘に戻ることになるのだから」
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

traits.locale_text: 「刃がどれほど強かろうと、どれほど完璧であろうとかまわない。時が来れば、鞘に戻ることになるのだから」

languages.text: “无论利刃有多么锋利，它的侍奉有多么完美，这都不重要。当时机到来时，它注定要被收回鞘中。”
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

traits.locale_text: “无论利刃有多么锋利，它的侍奉有多么完美，这都不重要。当时机到来时，它注定要被收回鞘中。”

languages.text: "Es spielt keine Rolle, wie stark eine Klinge ist oder wie tadellos ihr Dienst. Wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, muss sie zurück in die Scheide."
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

traits.locale_text: "Es spielt keine Rolle, wie stark eine Klinge ist oder wie tadellos ihr Dienst. Wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, muss sie zurück in die Scheide."

languages.text: « Si tranchante une lame soit-elle, et si irréprochables ses services, le temps venu, elle doit regagner son fourreau. »
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

traits.locale_text: « Si tranchante une lame soit-elle, et si irréprochables ses services, le temps venu, elle doit regagner son fourreau. »

languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."

languages.text: "Ne kılıcın ne kadar güçlü olduğu önemlidir ne de ne kadar kusursuz hizmet verdiği. Vakti geldiğinde her kılıç, kınına geri girmelidir."
languages.original_text: "It does not matter how strong a blade is, nor how faultless its service. When the time comes, it must return to its sheath."
